desc: The book elaborates selected, extended and peer reviewed papers from the International Conference on Power Electrical Systems held in Mahdia, Tunisia in 2015. Main Topics are: multivariable -, nonlinear-, stochastic-, and robust control, robotics and mechatronics, synthesis of automation systems.

details.authors: Nabil Derbel, Faouzi Derbel, Olfa Kanoun

title: Systems, Automation, and Control (Advances in Systems, Signals and Devices)
